name: Jin, Fate Defiant
effect: Inherited Effect — Whenever Jin attacks with a Polearm weapon and/or Polearm attack card, target Horse or Human ally you control gets +1 until end of turn. (Your champion has this ability as long as this card is part of its lineage.)
effect_raw: Inherited Effect — Whenever Jin attacks with a Polearm weapon and/or Polearm attack card, target Horse or Human ally you control gets +1 power until end of turn. (Your champion has this ability as long as this card is part of its lineage.)

editions.flavor: "Why fight to die when you can fight to live?"
"Why fight to die when you can fight to live?"

name: Jin, Zealous Maverick
effect: Jin Lineage (Jin, Zealous Maverick must be leveled from a previous level "Jin" champion.) On Enter: Jin's next attack this turn gets +1 and has "On Attack: Wake up Jin."
effect_raw:
Jin Lineage (Jin, Zealous Maverick must be leveled from a previous level "Jin" champion.) 

On Enter: Jin's next attack this turn gets +1 power and has "On Attack: Wake up Jin."

editions.flavor: "Unfortunately for you, I have something to fight for."
"Unfortunately for you, I have something to fight for."

name: Kongming, Wayward Maven
effect: On Enter: You gain the Shifting Currents mastery. (Players can only have one mastery. The Shifting Currents mastery has four modes: North, South, East, and West. Some cards benefit from certain directions of Shifting Currents. Starts in the North direction.)
effect_raw: On Enter: You gain the Shifting Currents mastery. (Players can only have one mastery. The Shifting Currents mastery has four modes: North, South, East, and West. Some cards benefit from certain directions of Shifting Currents. Starts in the North direction.)

rule.description: Shifting Mastery is not an object and cannot be targeted by any effects.

editions.flavor: "A lily pad is but a weed in a pond of lotuses."
"A lily pad is but a weed in a pond of lotuses."

name: Kongming, Ascetic Vice
effect: Kongming Lineage (Kongming, Ascetic Vice must be leveled from a previous level "Kongming" champion.) On Enter: Empower 3. Inherited Effect — Whenever your Shifting Currents change from facing North to South, draw a card.
effect_raw:
Kongming Lineage (Kongming, Ascetic Vice must be leveled from a previous level "Kongming" champion.) 

On Enter: Empower 3.

Inherited Effect — Whenever your Shifting Currents change from facing North to South, draw a card.

name: Kongming, Fel Eidolon
effect: Kongming Lineage On Enter: recover X, where X is the amount of tera element cards in your banishment. Whenever you activate a Spell card, you may change the direction of your Shifting Currents to an adjacent direction of your choice.
effect_raw: Kongming Lineage On Enter: recover X, where X is the amount of tera element cards in your banishment. Whenever you activate a Spell card, you may change the direction of your Shifting Currents to an adjacent direction of your choice.

rule.description: Changing adjacent directions means the currents can only go one step in a cardinal direction. For example, north can go either east or west whereas east can only go north or south.

name: Imperial Seal
effect: Divine Relic (You can only have one card with this keyword in your material deck.) Banish Imperial Seal: All basic elements are enabled for you until end of turn. (Fire, water, and wind are basic elements.)
effect_raw:
Divine Relic (You can only have one card with this keyword in your material deck.)

Banish Imperial Seal: All basic elements are enabled for you until end of turn. (Fire, water, and wind are basic elements.)

rule.description: Imperial Seal will not change the element of your champion, and therefore won't grant Element Bonuses for basic elements.

name: Dragon's Dawn
effect: As an additional cost to materialize this card, banish three fire element cards from your graveyard. Class BonusOn Attack: You may discard a fire element card and have Dragon's Dawn deal 2 unpreventable damage to your champion. If you do, this attack gets +2 and gains "On Champion Hit: Draw a card."
effect_raw:
As an additional cost to materialize this card, banish three fire element cards from your graveyard. 

[Class Bonus] On Attack: You may discard a fire element card and have Dragon's Dawn deal 2 unpreventable damage to your champion. If you do, this attack gets +2 power and gains "On Champion Hit: Draw a card."

name: Ebbing Tide
effect: Hindered (This object enters the field rested) : Empower 2. Activate this ability only if your Shifting Currents face East or West. , Banish Ebbing Tide: Empower X, where X is the amount of water element cards in your graveyard. Activate this ability only at slow speed and only if your Shifting Currents face North or South.
effect_raw:
Hindered (This object enters the field rested.)

[REST]: Empower 2. Activate this ability only if your Shifting Currents face East or West.

[REST]: Banish Ebbing Tide: Empower X, where X is the amount of water element cards in your graveyard. Activate this ability only at slow speed and only if your Shifting Currents face North or South.

name: Sundering Moon
effect: Jin Bonus On Enter: If you control two or more wind element allies, Sundering Moon gets +1 until end of turn. Jin Bonus 2, Return Sundering Moon to your material deck: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to target unit you control this turn.
effect_raw:
[Jin Bonus] On Enter: If you control two or more wind element allies, Sundering Moon gets +1 power until end of turn.

[Jin Bonus] (2), Return Sundering Moon to your material deck: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to target unit you control this turn.

name: Mortal Ambition
effect: This card costs 2 less to activate for each unique ally you control. Until end of turn, Human and Horse allies you control get +1 and gain ambush and steadfast.
effect_raw:
This card costs 2 less to activate for each unique ally you control.

Until end of turn, Human and Horse allies you control get +1 life and gain ambush and steadfast.

result_editions.flavor: In the midst of chaos, there is opportunity.

editions.flavor: In the midst of chaos, there is opportunity.

name: Sun Quan, Sealbearer
effect: Level 1+ On Enter: Put a buff counter on another target ally you control. Level 2+ Allies you control with a buff counter on them lose pride.
effect_raw:
[Level 1+] On Enter: Put a buff counter on another target ally you control.

[Level 2+] Allies you control with a buff counter on them lose pride.

name: Xiao Qiao, Cinderkeeper
effect: Stealth (This unit can't be targeted by attacks unless permitted by true sight.) Class BonusXiao Qiao's attacks can't be retaliated. If a unit hit by Xiao Qiao this turn would die, banish it instead.
effect_raw:
Stealth

[Class Bonus] Xiao Qiao's attacks can't be retaliated.

If a unit hit by Xiao Qiao this turn would die, banish it instead.

rule.description: Units banished by Xiao Qiao's ability do not trigger their On Death abilities.

name: Cao Cao, Aspirant of Chaos
effect: Equestrian — As long as you control a Horse ally, this card costs 3 less to activate. Class BonusOn Attack: You may banish a card with floating memory from your graveyard. If you do, deal 2 damage to each rested unit you don't control.
effect_raw:
Equestrian — As long as you control a Horse ally, this card costs 3 less to activate.

[Class Bonus] On Attack: You may banish a card with floating memory from your graveyard. If you do, deal 2 damage to each rested unit you don't control.

name: Xia Hou Dun, Gloryseeker
effect: Ranged 2 (As long as this unit is distant, its attacks get +2.) Class BonusAs long as you control a Sword or Bow weapon, Xia Hou Don gets +1. (Apply this effect only if your champion's class matches this card's class.)
effect_raw:
Ranged 2 (As long as this unit is distant, its attacks get +2 power.)

[Class Bonus] As long as you control a Sword or Bow weapon, Xia Hou Don gets +1 power. (Apply this effect only if your champion's class matches this card's class.)

name: Guan Yu, Prime Exemplar
effect: As long as a Human ally you controlled has died this turn, this card costs 2 less to activate and you may activate it as though it had Fast Activation. Ambush, Retort 2
effect_raw:
As long as a Human ally you controlled has died this turn, this card costs 2 less to activate and you may activate it as though it had fast activation.

Ambush, Retort 2

name: Liu Bei, Oathkeeper
effect: Ranged 2 Whenever another unit you control becomes distant, Liu Bei becomes distant. (Units stay distant until the end of their controller's turn.)
effect_raw:
Ranged 2

Whenever another unit you control becomes distant, Liu Bei becomes distant. (Units stay distant until the end of their controller's turn.)

editions.flavor: "The promise we made... Careful not to forget it."

name: Three Visits
effect: As an additional cost to activate this card, rest your champion. Class BonusYou may activate this card from your graveyard. If you do, banish it as it resolves. Class BonusYou may activate this card from your banishment. If you do, put it on the bottom of your deck as it resolves. Glimpse 2 and recover 2.
effect_raw: [Class Bonus] You may activate this card from your graveyard. If you do, banish it as it resolves. [Class Bonus] You may activate this card from your banishment. If you do, put it on the bottom of your deck as it resolves. Rest your champion. If you do, glimpse 2 and recover 2.

rule.description: If Three Visits were to be negated, it will go to the zone it would have gone to if it had resolved.

rule.title: ERRATA
rule.description: As an additional cost to activate this card, rest your champion.

rule.title: ERRATA
rule.description: 'Rest your champion. If you do, glimpse 2 and recover 2. -> Glimpse 2 and recover 2.'

name: Zhang Fei, Spirited Steel
effect: Class BonusVigor (This unit wakes up at the beginning of your end phase.) Class BonusAt the beginning of your end phase, if Zhang Fei is the only ally you control, put a buff counter on Zhang Fei.
effect_raw:
[Class Bonus] Vigor (This unit wakes up at the beginning of your end phase.)
[Class Bonus] At the beginning of your end phase, if Zhang Fei is the only ally you control, put a buff counter on Zhang Fei.

name: Zhao Yun, Dragonsblood
effect: Class BonusOn Attack: You may have Zhao Yun deal 2 unpreventable damage to your champion. If you do, this attack gets +2. Class BonusOn Kill: Zhao Yun gains immortality. (This effect lasts indefinitely.)
effect_raw:
[Class Bonus] On Attack: You may have Zhao Yun deal 2 unpreventable damage to your champion. If you do, this attack gets +2 power.

[Class Bonus] On Kill: Zhao Yun gains immortality. (This effect lasts indefinitely.)

name: Dong Zhou, False Liege
effect: Intercept Class BonusOn Enter: You may rest Dong Zhou. If you do, choose two— • Deal 3 damage to all other allies. • Empower 3. • Dong Zhou gains vigor until end of turn.
effect_raw:
Intercept

[Class Bonus] On Enter: You may rest Dong Zhou. If you do, choose two—
• Deal 3 damage to all other allies.
• Empower 3.
• Dong Zhou gains vigor until end of turn.
